heroes.name: npc_dota_hero_earthshaker
heroes.bio_loc:
Like a golem or gargoyle, Earthshaker was one with the earth but now walks freely upon it. Unlike those other entities, he created himself through an act of will, and serves no other master. In restless slumbers, encased in a deep seam of stone, he became aware of the life drifting freely above him. He grew curious.

During a season of tremors, the peaks of Nishai shook themselves loose of avalanches, shifting the course of rivers and turning shallow valleys into bottomless chasms. When the land finally ceased quaking, Earthshaker stepped from the settling dust, tossing aside massive boulders as if throwing off a light blanket.

He had shaped himself in the image of a mortal beast, and named himself Raigor Stonehoof. He bleeds now, and breathes, and therefore he can die. But his spirit is still that of the earth; he carries its power in the magical totem that never leaves him. And on the day he returns to dust, the earth will greet him as a prodigal son.
heroes.hype_loc: Whether blocking an enemy's escape, dividing their forces, or shattering the ground beneath gathered foes, Earthshaker is at his best when he strikes without warning. Whatever survives the aftershocks still has a swing from his mighty totem to look forward to.
heroes.npe_desc_loc: Disrupts enemy team with his chain stuns

facets.description_loc: Aftershock radius is increased by {s:bonus_aftershock_range_increase_per_level_interval} every {s:bonus_aftershock_range_level_interval} hero levels.
facets.name: earthshaker_tectonic_buildup

facets.description_loc: Enemies killed with Enchant Totem are sent flying, dealing damage to enemies they hit.
facets.name: earthshaker_slugger

abilities.name: earthshaker_fissure
abilities.desc_loc: Slams the ground with a mighty totem, creating an impassable ridge of stone while stunning and damaging enemy units along its line.
abilities.lore_loc: The Nishian totem splits the world to its core with tectonic force.
notes_loc: Creeps will wait for Fissure to disappear. They will not attempt to walk around it.
Fissure is not blocked by Linken's Sphere.
abilities.shard_loc: Reduces Fissure cooldown and allows Earthshaker to walk on it. When he casts any ability, an Aftershock is released along its path that stuns for a shortened duration.

abilities.name: earthshaker_enchant_totem
abilities.desc_loc: Empowers Earthshaker's totem, causing it to deal extra damage and have %bonus_attack_range% bonus attack range on the next attack.
abilities.lore_loc: Raigor's gorilla strength can destroy mountains.
notes_loc: Bonus damage is based on base damage and that given by primary attribute.
abilities.scepter_loc: Enchant Totem becomes a ground target ability, causing Earthshaker to jump in the air and land at the target spot, casting Enchant Totem there.  Self-casting the ability will behave in the original form, without jumping. Grants Enchant Totem a cleaving attack.
facets_loc: Enemies killed with Enchant Totem are sent flying, dealing damage to enemies they hit.

special_values.name: projectile_body_damage_additional_percent_health
special_values.heading_loc: KILL KNOCKBACK MAX HEALTH AS DAMAGE:

abilities.name: earthshaker_aftershock
abilities.desc_loc: Causes the earth to shake underfoot, adding additional damage and stuns to nearby enemy units when Earthshaker casts his abilities.
abilities.lore_loc: The earth trembles beneath the mighty footsteps of Raigor.
notes_loc: Using items does not trigger Aftershock.
facets_loc: Aftershock radius is increased by %aftershock_range_increase_per_level_interval% every %aftershock_range_level_interval% hero levels.

abilities.name: earthshaker_echo_slam
abilities.desc_loc: Shockwaves travel through the ground, damaging enemy units.  Each enemy hit causes an echo to damage nearby units. Real heroes cause two echoes.
abilities.lore_loc: Tectonic plates crack, mountains fold, and foes are crushed by the Echo Slam.
